sentence.Network_en: They were clean - limbed , sound and white of teeth, graceful and fast in their movements.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们一个个长得干净利落, 牙齿洁白, 身手矫健,举动敏捷.

sentence.Network_en: They were more concerned about the dogs' welfare than a clean getaway.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们更加关心那些狗的安危，而非自己如何干净利落地脱身。

sentence.Network_en: When he had finished washing he began to wipe the basin clean.
sentence.Network_cn: 他清洗完后开始把洗脸池擦拭干净。
